title: What DRM service can I use to protect my audio books from casual copy? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi Ademole: The Haihaisoft Media DRM Platform enables the secure deployment of digital ... copy-protection program for PDF files, Flash files, e-books, and Web- based content. It can stop copying, prevent printing, disable Print Screen, expire content, and control panel that helps reduce a form of piracy known as casual copying.
